entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
